name: Scotty Brown
text: This is the quality of pizza at this pizza hut. When we tried to get a remake of this pizza they denied and when we asked for corporates number they hung up on us.

name: Pure Artistry
text: Had a not so happy experience with this place Once, and they went above and beyond to ensure that I was accommodated and that i I was heard. I definitely appreciate how hard these people work and seeing how nice they were kind of made me …More

name: Taylor Ann Rodamaker
text: Burnt pizza. Clearly don't know how to make the cinnamon sticks as they are never cut right and the cinnamon is always in big dry chunks. Ever since they downsized-they've gotten worse. The employees are half good, half bad-depends who you …More

name: Julie Williams
text: Way over done pizza. Mushrooms were burnt. Staff was friendly and offered me a free warming bag but disappointed in the overall pizza.☹

name: Megs Bullcalf
text: When I call then I always get my order 15 minutes or less my food is always right and the delivery is people are very nice

text: Ordered online. Got order. They forgot part of it. I called and they said it was on it's way. Then I called back 40 min later when it still hadn't arrived. They said they tried to deliver and I said well I've been watching and they said …More

name: monica weller
text: What happened to the good salad bar? Soggy lettuce! No eggs, peas or sunflower seeds like they had in the past. Our pizza was good, server was friendly but a bit slow. Not worth the  $40 bill.

name: Robin Ballweg
text: I ordered for pizzas for pickup three of them were decent, my large taco had had maybe a tablespoons worth of tomatoes on it same with onions, and the chips were still whole. I got the pizza and all I could think was they just wanted to …More

name: Cari Coker-Fritsch
text: Taco pizza was missing sour cream and salsa, and had barbecue sauce on the crust.  Sticks hardly had any seasoning and no marinara sauce.  Pasta was bland.  Disappointing.

name: Patrick Sorg
text: Good food

text: i got sick after this

name: Alissa Brunner
text: Drove from Arena to Sauk for dinner after milking last night and get home and have the wrong order. So I call and the kid says you picked up the wrong order I said no you gave me the wrong order and he says yeah same difference! Umm no …More

name: Jake Budde
text: Used to go here a lot but since they stopped the lunch buffet on weekdays we haven't been back.  Just called to check on if they have that back yet or not three times while they're open, no answer all three times.

name: Cindy Young
text: ordered mant times from sauk city pizza hut. phone service is poorly done at times and delivery is ok but getting what you order is a complete disaster. ive even finally called corporate office to complain and service was messed up once …More

name: Justin Zimmer
text: Very understaffed. We've been waiting an hour and haven't been told how long of a wait or anything. Management must be horrible here for them to be so understaffed. …More

name: Phoenix Fyre
text: Full disclaimer: I did work here, once upon a time. The food is what you expect from a Pizza Hut, not terrible but not great. The service is lacking though. 1 in 3 times I order, my pizza will be wrong. In house, I always expect to wait 45 …More

name: Sunn Sett
text: I ordered a Pan style pizza from there about a month ago and it was burnt on one side and under cooked on the other, and it appeared as it it was tossed around without care before it was delivered. I think the over-all quality of the pizza …More

name: Brenda Szeflinski
text: Ashley was amazing! Excellent customer service and provided detailed menu options. Pizza was excellent and on time. Bill is an excellent delivery driver. Very professional! Thanks Pizza Hut.

name: Jolene Krisher
text: Lovely, quiet & clean. I would def take a group if eating out with friends I wanted to visit with. Service was fast & waitress Ashley very friendly & extra helpful. I'll be back!

name: Spencer Baugher
text: Food good. Service is horrible. Waited way to long inside only ones in there, but watched car after car go in the drive thru and get there food one after another.. waiter said kitchen busy.. no discount no anything. I will contunie going to Dodgeville or Richland Center or Baraboo for Pizza Hut

name: Dan Orth
text: Pizza buffet for lunch is usually good. Ask you server for a particular pizza, and they will make it for you. The salad area sometimes looks like it could use some TLC. The staff is friendly and welcoming.

name: Adem Al-Quraishi
text:
The worse pizza I had ever, it has nothing to do with Pizza Hut, they add staff to it makes it test like ????, they add crunchy taco, no cheese,
Are you serious ?

text: They barely pick up their phone. and when they do the employees are very rude.

name: Carol Cady-Severson
text:
Salad bar looks terrible.  Lettuce brown.  Cheese pizza overcooked.
Drive 15 minutes to Baraboo

name: Nathan Weber
text: Great pizza every time! !

name: Andrew Brantmeyer
text: Great Food and Service. The Staff did a pretty good job. Family Night out and They had the Buffet.

name: Kim Gruwell
text: Buffet was good but kind of small. Fast service.

name: Mariah Szeflinski
text: Kaden has poor customer service. He hung up on me without fully understanding my simple request. Simply rude, disrespectful, and petty. I have never felt so undervalued as a customer. Step up your skills Kaden! I would give zero stars if it was a choice.

name: Crystal Brann
text: The worst place when you place a order the font have it made for u at all so don't go here go to Baraboo Pizza Hut instead

text: Good quick service.  Lunch buffet is good for a quick bite, but can get busy during peak hours.

text: The woman that runs the drive thru window is super friendly.

name: Matthew Welch
text: Friendly staff, clean, pizza solid quality, but understaffed.
